name: Tennis & Learning Center - Hamilton
description: Tennis & Learning Center (TLC) is an out-of-school-time program that promotes academic achievement, health and wellness, and social-emotional development through the sport of tennis.
fullDescription: Tennis & Learning Center (TLC) is an out-of-school-time program that promotes academic achievement, health and wellness, and social-emotional development through the sport of tennis.
whatTheyOffer: Tennis & Learning Center (TLC) is an out-of-school-time program that promotes academic achievement, health and wellness, and social-emotional development through the sport of tennis.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
address: Geary and Steiner Street, San Francisco, CA, 94115
